column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " Wait a second folks .
#Text=He listened to me , Mako .
#Text=I told him not to throw the fight and he listened .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " You what ?!
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , well , you know , I 'm sure there are other factors .
#Text=" Lightning Bolt Zolt says : " All right , enough , enough .
#Text=You look ridiculous , fighting with kids .
#Text=It 's not dignified .
#Text=And you ; what gives ?
#Text=You cost me a lot of money just now .
#Text=I thought you were an honorable man .
#Text=" Toza says : " I am an honorable man .
#Text=I just needed someone to remind me .
#Text=Here 's your money back .
#Text=Now get out of my gym .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " Lets go , boys .
#Text=We 're gon na talk about this when we get back to the hideout .
#Text=" Toza says : " Wait .
#Text=You guys have got some real bending skills .
#Text=With a little training , I think you could go pro .
#Text=I could teach you everything I know .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " Sorry bum , but at least one of these kids is too smart to end up like you , right Mako ?
#Text=" Toza says : " I could find you a place to stay right here in the arena .
#Text=Who knows , you could be champs .
#Text=At least it 's a chance at an honest living .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Can we , Mako ?
#Text=Mako , can we please ?
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " Do n't go soft on me , Mako .
#Text=Remember , it 's up to you to take care of your little brother .
#Text=Use your head , make the smart play .
#Text=" Mako says : " Sorry Shady , but you 're right .
#Text=I do have to take care of my brother , and I think this is what 's best for him .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " Suit yourself .
#Text=But who knows , maybe we can fix a fight together , some time .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm so glad we 're not criminals anymore .
#Text=Lets celebrate over dinner .
#Text=" Mako says : " Err , I think we better save our money .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , I have lots of money coming .
#Text=I bet everything we had on the Boar - q - pines .
#Text=" Mako says : " What ?!
#Text=But you knew the fight was fixed .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What can I say ?
#Text=I had a good feeling .
#Text="
